mapper.sql: id, memberID, name, mobile, password, weixin_id AS weixinId, gender, birthday, coins, points, catch_number AS catchNumber, register_date AS registerDate, modified_date AS modifiedDate, modified_by AS modifiedBy, last_login_date AS lastLoginDate, last_logoff_date AS lastLogoffDate, online_flg AS onlineFlg, icon_context_path AS iconContextPath, icon_file_name AS iconFileName, icon_real_path AS iconRealPath, easemob_uuid AS easemobUuid, active_flg AS activeFlg, invite_flg AS inviteFlg, invite_flg_web AS inviteFlgWeb, register_from AS registerFrom, last_login_from AS lastLoginFrom,first_login AS firstLogin, first_charge AS firstCharge, register_channel AS registerChannel, login_channel AS loginChannel, phone_model AS phoneModel,agent_super_id AS agentSuperId,agent_one_id AS agentOneId,agent_two_id AS agentTwoId,agent_three_id AS agentThreeId

a.id, a.memberID, a.name, a.mobile, a.password, a.weixin_id AS weixinId, a.gender, a.birthday, a.coins, a.points, a.catch_number AS catchNumber, a.register_date AS registerDate, a.modified_date AS modifiedDate, a.modified_by AS modifiedBy, a.last_login_date AS lastLoginDate, a.last_logoff_date AS lastLogoffDate, a.online_flg AS onlineFlg, a.icon_context_path AS iconContextPath, a.icon_file_name AS iconFileName, a.icon_real_path AS iconRealPath, a.easemob_uuid AS easemobUuid, a.active_flg AS activeFlg, a.invite_flg AS inviteFlg, a.invite_flg_web AS inviteFlgWeb, a.register_from AS registerFrom, a.last_login_from AS lastLoginFrom, a.first_login AS firstLogin, a.first_charge AS firstCharge, a.register_channel AS registerChannel, a.login_channel AS loginChannel, a.phone_model AS phoneModel, b.jicun AS checkIn,agent_super_id AS agentSuperId,agent_one_id AS agentOneId,agent_two_id AS agentTwoId,agent_three_id AS agentThreeId, c.growth_value AS growthValue
mapper.select:
select
from t_member where 1=1
and register_channel = #{channelNum}
and name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
AND DATEDIFF(register_date,#{beginTime}) >= 0
AND DATEDIFF(register_date,#{endTime})<0
AND phone_model = #{phoneModel}
order by register_date desc

select
FROM (select * from t_member where 1=1 and register_channel in ('an1','an2','an3','an4','an5','an6','an7') and id not in (SELECT user_id from member_channel_deduct) or register_from = 'iOSxyj') a WHERE 1=1
and register_channel = #{channelNum}
and memberID = #{userId}
and name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
AND DATEDIFF(register_date,#{beginTime}) >= 0
AND DATEDIFF(register_date,#{endTime})<0
AND register_from = 'android'
AND register_from = 'iOSxyj'
order by register_date desc
SELECT register_channel FROM t_member GROUP by register_channel
